products.name: Silicone Case for AirPods Pro with Carabiner
products.description: Shockproof silicone case for AirPods Pro. Includes a keychain carabiner, supports wireless charging, and protects against scratches and drops.

products.name: Women's Seamless Wireless Sports Bra – 3-Pack
products.description: Comfortable, wire-free, and seamless sports bras with full coverage and stretch fit. Ideal for daily wear, yoga, or light workouts. Available in multiple colors.

products.name: Exfoliating Body Scrub Bath Gloves – 4 Pairs
products.description: Textured exfoliating gloves for deep cleansing and smooth skin. Ideal for shower or bath use. Comes in assorted colors: blue, white, purple, and pink.

products.name: 2-Tier Spice Rack Organizer for Kitchen Cabinet
products.description: Rotating 2-tier spice rack fits bottles up to 5' x 2.25'. Great for storing herbs and spices in a compact, accessible design.
